itunesq

Class XMLHandler

  • Object
    • XMLHandler

  • public final class XMLHandler
extends Object
    Class that reads and processes the iTunes XML file.

    This is a final class consisting entirely of static methods.

    The main public method is processXML, that uses JDOM to walk through the XML file. I'd like to note that the iTunes XML is rather ridiculous and difficult to work with. Just saying.

    Author:
    Jon

        Reads and processes the XML file.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
